title: Installation issue: rust fails to build on CentOS 7
body:
FYI: @AndrewGaspar

### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install rust

### Information on your system

```
$ spack debug report
* **Spack:** 0.16.0-72-e664106
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-skylake_avx512
* **Concretizer:** original
$
```

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt]()

#### `spack-build-env.txt`

```
$ cat /local_scratch/george.hartzell/tmp/spack/var/spack/stage/spack-stage-rust-1.47.0-p5lez7h75at4fcsay7cee4pn26ft3ggg/spack-build-env.txt
ACLOCAL_PATH=/local_scratch/george.hartzell/tmp/spack/opt/spack/linux-centos7-skylake_avx512/gcc-8.4.0/pkgconf-1.7.3-r4fbdt26t4bvhuc3kdzmztimmjtjljas/share/aclocal; export ACLOCAL_PATH
BASH_ENV=/lmod/lmod/init/bash; export BASH_ENV
function _spack_shell_wrapper() {  for var in LD_LIBRARY_PATH DYLD_LIBRARY_PATH DYLD_FALLBACK_LIBRARY_PATH;
 do
 eval "if [ -n \"\${${var}-}\" ]; then export SPACK_$var=\${${var}}; fi";
 done;
 if [ -n "${ZSH_VERSION:-}" ]; then
 emulate -L sh;
 fi;
 _sp_flags="";
 while [ ! -z ${1+x} ] && [ "${1#-}" != "${1}" ]; do
 _sp_flags="$_sp_flags $1";
 shift;
 done;
 if [ -n "$_sp_flags" ] && [ "${_sp_flags#*h}" != "${_sp_flags}" ] || [ "${_sp_flags#*V}" != "${_sp_flags}" ]; then
 command spack $_sp_flags "$@";
 return;
 fi;
 _sp_subcommand="";
 if [ ! -z ${1+x} ]; then
 _sp_subcommand="$1";
 shift;
 fi;
 case $_sp_subcommand in
 "cd")
 _sp_arg="";
 if [ -n "$1" ]; then
 _sp_arg="$1";
 shift;
 fi;
 if [ "$_sp_arg" = "-h" ] || [ "$_sp_arg" = "--help" ]; then
 command spack cd -h;
 else
 LOC="$(spack location $_sp_arg "$@")";
 if [ -d "$LOC" ]; then
 cd "$LOC";
 else
 return 1;
 fi;
 fi;
 return
 ;;
 "env")
 _sp_arg="";
 if [ -n "$1" ]; then
 _sp_arg="$1";
 shift;
 fi;
 if [ "$_sp_arg" = "-h" ] || [ "$_sp_arg" = "--help" ]; then
 command spack env -h;
 else
 case $_sp_arg in
 activate)
 _a=" $@";
 if [ -z ${1+x} ] || [ "${_a#* --sh}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* --csh}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* -h}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* --help}" != "$_a" ]; then
 command spack env activate "$@";
 else
 eval $(command spack $_sp_flags env activate --sh "$@");
 fi
 ;;
 deactivate)
 _a=" $@";
 if [ "${_a#* --sh}" != "$_a" ] || [ "${_a#* --csh}" != "$_a" ]; then
 command spack env deactivate "$@";
 else
 if [ -n "$*" ]; then
 command spack env deactivate -h;
 else
